titleStmt.title: SII 7.542: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 542. (A.R. No. 316 of 1901). The inscription is built in at the right end. IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pukaḻmātu viḷaṅka jayamātu virumpa nilamakaḷ nilava malarmakaḷ puṇara Urimaiyiṟ ciṟan=ta maṇimuṭi cūṭi mīṉavar nilaikeṭa villavar kulaitara Eṉai maṉṉavar Iriyaluṟ ṟuḻitarat tikkaṉaittu n=taṉ cakkara naṭātti vijaiAbhiṣekam paṇṇi vīrasiṁhāsaṉattu Ulakuṭaiyāḷoṭum vīṟṟi
nilavilai Āvaṇakkai Eḻuttu Itdevaṟkut tiruvarddhacāmattukku veṇṭum paṭikku rājentracoḻavaḷanāṭṭup puḻalnāṭṭuc cempiyaṉ tirumaṅkalattut tirumaṅkalaṅkiḻāṉ ciyārur veḷḷiyāna teṉnavaṉ pallavarayaṉ Eṅkaḷpakkaṟ koṇṭu viṭukiṟa nilattukkuk kīḻpāṟkellai śrītevivatikku meṟku
bhūmikku vaṭakku melpāṟkellai mātevicceṟuvukkum Āriyampākkattu nākamaiyapaṭṭaṉ bhūmikkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai Ivvāriyampākkattu nākamaiyapaṭṭar pūmikkum Ivvūr śrīkayilāsamuṭaiyār devatāṉattukku teṟkum nāṉkellai Akattuppaṭṭa nilam samhāram paṇṇic caturaṅkaṭṭiṉa patinaṟucāṇkolāl A
ttom Inta nilattukku velikkācuḷḷiṭṭa An=tarāya meṉṟum niravilai Eṉṟum nilamuḻuta kuṭimakkaḷai Āḷvari Eṉṟum Eccoṟṟuk kūṟṟunel veṭṭi Amañci Eṉṟu kāṭṭavum koḷḷavum peṟātomākavum IppaṭiAllatu ceyyil gaṅkaiIṭaik kumariIṭai naṭuvupaṭṭār ceta pāpam Anupavikkakkaṭavomākavum Ippaṭikku sammatittu viṟṟukkuṭuttom mahāsabhaiyom .
The inscription is built in at the right end.
Digital edition of SII 7.542 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
